title: [Large-Scale] Integrated TBL-PBL Instructional Design to Promote Self-Directed Learning in Medical Education

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Basic Medical Education and Adult Learning Theory
context.additional_context: Training Program for Pre-Service Teachers to Strengthen Self-Directed Learning Competencies in Medical Education Settings

learning_goals: Learners can distinguish and explain the self-directed learning mechanisms of TBL (Team-Based Learning) and PBL (Problem-Based Learning) with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can develop and execute self-directed learning plans at least three times in a mobile environment and provide feedback on the results.
Learners can comparatively evaluate the time efficiency of team-based learning and problem-based learning through analysis of real clinical cases.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
